title: Spreading Cultures  - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Spreading Cultures  - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


DESCRIPTION
This mod causes your primary culture to slowly spread to provinces you control. 

Having a high stability and high prestige will cause provinces to adopt your culture faster. 

Accepted cultures should never convert, unless they stop being accepted. 

======= 
Accepted cultures CAN convert now, I'll be working on a fix for that in the near future. 

======= 
Updates! 

June 16th 2014 - Fix for 1.6 suggested by bobsmith and Tyler. Let me know if it works! 

July 21st 2014 - Fixed a typo in the script that may have been causing crashes.
